snippet: Senator Aaron Osmond has dropped his push for a state constitutional amendment that would define life as beginning at conception.
abstract: Senator Aaron Osmond of Utah drops his push for a state constitutional amendment that would define life as beginning at conception.
lead_paragraph: Senator Aaron Osmond has dropped his push for a state constitutional amendment that would define life as beginning at conception.

headline.seo: Utah: Effort for ‘Personhood’ Amendment Is Dropped
headline.main: Utah: Effort for ‘Personhood’ Amendment Is Dropped
headline.print_headline: Utah: Effort For ‘Personhood’ Amendment Is Dropped
